resources.string:
Santosh Kenchaamba Born on 6-6-1973 in Kenchamban hoskote, Hassan District in large family called 'Kenchamba' with more than 100 cousins and uncles spread across all over the world now.
Family has various business interests ranging from Coffee Estates, Rice mills, Petrol bunks to lodging. Family has been actively involved in various donations for the society majorly in villages.
Santosh Started his career as entrepreneur post Management education. Started as commodity broker, stock brooking, computers \and now real estate.
